mapper.select: select b.seat_id from employee a,seat b where a.comp_seq = b.comp_seq
mapper.insert: insert into MENU ( menu_seq, comp_seq, menu_sellFlag, menu_name, menu_price, menu_category ) values ( menu_seq.nextval, #{comp_seq}, #{menu_sellFlag}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_category} )
mapper.select: select menu_seq, comp_seq, menu_sellFlag, menu_name, menu_price, menu_category from MENU where menu_seq = #{menu_seq}
mapper.update: update MENU set comp_seq = #{comp_seq}, menu_sellFlag = #{menu_sellFlag}, menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, menu_category = #{menu_category} where menu_seq = #{menu_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into EXPENSE ( expense_seq, comp_seq, expense_type, expense_date, expense_description, expense_amount ) values ( expense_seq.nextval, #{comp_seq}, expense_type = #{expense_type}, expense_date = #{expense_date}, expense_description = #{expense_description}, expense_amount = #{expense_amount} )
mapper.select: select expense_seq, comp_seq, expense_type, expense_date, expense_description, expense_amount from EXPENSE where expense_seq = #{expense_seq}
mapper.update: update EXPENSE set comp_seq = #{comp_seq}, expense_type = #{expense_type}, expense_date = #{expense_date}, expense_description = #{expense_description}, expense_amount = #{expense_amount} where expense_seq = #{expense_seq}
